manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Soft Touch Handles The T-Fal Titanium Advanced cookware set has riveted soft touch handles that are ergonomically designed for a comfortable and safe grip. Handles are oven safe up to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Thermo-Spot Proper preheating to seal in food's flavor is a breeze with the patented T-fal Thermo-Spot, which clearly indicates when the pan has reached the optimal temperature to begin cooking. Titanium Advanced Nonstick Interior A special process creates a non-stick cooking surface reinforced with Titanium for the ultimate durability and longest lasting performance. The Titanium Advanced nonstick interior provides amazing food release and removes the fear of using metal utensils while cooking in non-stick pans.

Ideas You Can't Live Without Present in 120 countries, T-fal's mission is to offer ingenious products to make cooking simpler and more rewarding as well as making ironing easier and faster. T-fal is dedicated to understanding the consumer's needs and bringing innovative solutions. T-fal's history is marked with world-class innovations.

Features and Benefits Hard Anodized Construction Heavy gauge Hard Anodized aluminum with Titanium reinforced nonstick interior for frying, sautéing and browning Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Dishwasher Safe Easy to clean cookware; safe for dishwasher use Riveted Silicone Handles Designed for comfort and safety; oven safe up to 400°F

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time.It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love.Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking.T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Eggs!
reviews.reviewText: This small skillet is one of the best I’ve ever used. The non-stick coating is fantastic (granted I still add a little oil, but only a tiny bit is required).The handle length is great.As to size, note that the diameter of the pan is only 7.5 inches, which is my favorite size. I find that 8 inch fry/sauté pans are a bit larger than I need.The bottom of the pan has a metallic layer, which enables fast heating and conduction (plus supports an induction stovetop…which I don’t have). It works great on my gas stove.This pan brings back the EASY in my Over Easy eggs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent quality for this price
reviews.reviewText: I got an induction cook top and for many years I have been using this brand T-FAL and like the other pans I got from this manufacturer EXCELLENT QUALITY. Easy to clean even if you use a dishwasher, pan does not get scratch, non stick at all even after many year. I have never been disappointed so I do recommend this product. Well packed, delivery was fast. Good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite pan
reviews.reviewText: This is my second of this brand. My first is a smaller and I wanted one in a large size. I appreciate everything about it. The ease of cleaning, the food slipping and never sticking. The handle allows for putting into the oven and more. I wash by hand with a tiny bead of dishsoap and air dry. The pan is FABulous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought numerous commercial or chef-grade pan sets for many hundreds of dollars. They have not held up any better than high quality non-stick pans like T-Fal. I now buy a new T-Fal every 3 years or so for top-notch non-stick performance. Nothing beats new, and just replacing my T-Fals after years of use is a fantastic experience and more cost-effective vs. paying hundreds of dollars for expensive sets that stop performing acceptably after a few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pan. Little deceiving.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really super well made pan. Cleans easy and well. Heats like crazy and light enough to use extensively. My only star down here is because the bottom isn’t 8”. This thing is tiny. It’s 8” around the top perimeter where the pan’s flare is. Not where whatever you’re frying is. Like really tiny. Good for one person breast. Not two. I am keeping it. There will be use for it and it’s a joy to use. I will be buying the same exact model tefal large size and sauce pans for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a wonderfully slick surface
reviews.reviewText: I have been a fan of T-fal for years. But I haven't had a skillet this good ever. Does great with scrambled eggs. After cooking the eggs, let the pan cook. The run a wet or dry dishrag over the interior and it is clean. Super easy to use in all situations after 6 weeks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars T-Fal Has Created the Perfect Pan
reviews.reviewText: We struggle to replace pans that we've known and loved for years because sometimes you end up with something that doesn't quite fit the bill for you. Then you ask yourself why you didn't keep the old pan. But this pan has become our go-to for the smaller pan (it is not small by any means) uses like aiggs and sausage and potato sides and such. My friend says eggs like aiggs so aiggs it is. Anyway, this pan is absolutely magnificent quality, has a good stay-cool handle (and no water pouring from anywhere after removing from the dishwasher) and we are going to get another one. I must say I am not quite sure still what the center dot is for, though. It does not change as far as we can tell. But who cares - the pan is spot-on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Won’t buy different brands
reviews.reviewText: These frying pans are by far the best for the money

Increíble sartén, llevo meses utilizándolo todos los días y esta como nuevo, super fácil de limpiar y no se le pega nada. Se siente de calidad y el mango de acero inoxidable es muy bonito. Vale la pena por el precio invertir en un sartén como este, no necesitaran comprar otro en mucho tiempo.
Buenos materiales y excelente para mi estufa de inducción

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Frying Pan I've Ever Owned
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, this is the best frying pan I have ever purchased, and I've used it twice a day, every day for about 3 months. I don't need to turn the heat up nearly as high, and even the most stubborn residue (like cooked on egg) glides off the pan without soap under the tap. It's also an awesome pan to use when cooking fish, as you don't need to use any oil and nothing ends up sticking.I usually throw everything in the dishwasher because I'm pretty lazy, but it's so easy to clean this pan that moving it to the dishwasher from the sink is more work than just a quick rinse and scrub.I'm also a big fan of the entirely metal design. I've found that plastic handles tend to get a little grimy after a few years of use and are a tad difficult to clean, but no issue with that here. I haven't noticed any issues with the handle getting too hot, and the ability to use this pan in the oven will bring some versatility to your kitchen toolbox.I'm exceedingly impressed with this pan. I can't wait to collect every size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great on my Salton induction hot plate
reviews.reviewText: Made pancakes, burgers, scrambled eggs, etc., all came out great. Cleans very easily with a sponge, soap and water.Feels like quality goods, love the handle. No problem with the bottom being flat unlike a few reviews.
